title: new Client not saving download history. restarts from beginning of  14 gb download if closed.
body: I run off mobile internet so it takes a while for me to download updates. Decided to Download LoL again and have been trying for 3 days. If the connection is lost, or if the client is closed it loses all data that was already download and starts from scratch. Ideas?

replies.body: Indeed, the patcher needs to completely process the update.  Canceling out early or losing connection can also cause already existing game files to rescan for corruption, further delaying the update.  If possible, your best bet is to stick to a constant, stable connection.  My first suggestion would be to swap from mobile to another source, but our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide might help too.  Good luck!
